div.head: Bibliography
div.p: The prefixes of personal names (de, van, van de, ter, etc.) are ignored in the alphabetization. Thus Jean de la Fontaine will be found under F.

listBibl.head: Works by Mondrian
listBibl.bibl: Andersen, Hans Christian Danish fairy legends and tales. Translated by Caroline Peachey. 3rd ed. London 1861.
Tableaux modernes de premier ordre. Collection John Saulnier de Bordeaux. Vente après décès (Hôtel Drouot). Auct. cat. Paris 1886.
Tilborgh, Louis van, Van Gogh in Cormon’s studio: a chronological puzzle, in Current issues in 19th-century art. Van Gogh Studies 1. Zwolle and Amsterdam 2007, pp. 52-71.
Tilborgh, Louis van, Teio Meedendorp and Oda van Maanen, ‘Sunset at Montmajour’: a newly discovered painting by Vincent van Gogh;, in The Burlington Magazine 155 (2013), pp. 696-705.
Leo Jansen, Hans Luijten, Nienke Bakker (eds.) (2009), Vincent van Gogh - The Letters. Version: December 2010. Amsterdam & The Hague: Van Gogh Museum & Huygens ING.

listBibl.head: Works by others
